Metadata.Title: CVE-2020-19692 affecting package nginx for versions less than 1.22.1-11
Metadata.Description: CVE-2020-19692 affecting package nginx for versions less than 1.22.1-11. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package nginx is earlier than 1.22.1-11, affected by CVE-2020-19692
